article_title: Book Review: '15 Sports Myths and Why They're Wrong' by Rodney Fort and Jason Winfree
article_text: Is there anyone left in America, who's given the matter any thought, who still thinks college sports can continue as they are? NCAA-style amateurism is an obvious artifice, as our finest universities act more or less like pimps, lining their pockets and moaning whenever anyone threatens to cut in on their territory. But what to do about it? A lot of people make a lot of money off the present setup—coaches, athletic directors, administrators and broadcasters, if not athletes—and they're not going to give up just because of various Biblical warnings to not to be one who "useth his neighbour's service without...
